derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: plural of obsolete mathematic 'mathematics', from Old French mathematique, from Latin (ars) mathematica 'mathematical (art'), from Greek mathēmatikē (tekhnē), from the base of manthanein 'learn'
